class.name: ResourceImporterShaderFile
class.brief_description: Imports native GLSL shaders (not Godot shaders) as a [RDShaderFile].
class.description: This imports native GLSL shaders as [RDShaderFile] resources, for use with low-level [RenderingDevice] operations. This importer does [i]not[/i] handle [code].gdshader[/code] files.
